body_html:
Good for API addition.
You'll have to update the API goldens (details in the failing tests, but basically run:

    $ bazel build tensorflow/tools/api/tests:api_compatibility_test
    $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True
body_text:
Good for API addition.
You'll have to update the API goldens (details in the failing tests, but basically run:
    $ bazel build tensorflow/tools/api/tests:api_compatibility_test
    $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True
body:
Good for API addition.
You'll have to update the API goldens (details in the failing tests, but basically run:

```shell
    $ bazel build tensorflow/tools/api/tests:api_compatibility_test
    $ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test \
          --update_goldens True
```
